title: Inventory Management System
description: This project was focused on creating a robust inventory management system that allows businesses to track and manage their stock levels efficiently.

title: Underwater Pollution Detection
description: An AI-powered system designed to detect and classify various types of underwater pollutants using image processing and machine learning techniques.

title: E-commerce Website Development
description: This project involved designing and developing a full-featured e-commerce platform with an admin panel for the client Sydeny4x4. The platform includes custom functionalities, social media integration, and a user-friendly interface to enhance the shopping experience.
features: Custom admin panel for managing products, orders, and customers
Responsive design for mobile and desktop users
SEO-optimized for better search engine ranking
